data.introduce: 本接口实现了退票单修改功能。
data.business: 支持当日修改手工退票单功能，支持修改coupon/commission/payment/refundfee/rmk等内容，暂不支持删除税项。
data.functions:
同黑屏TRFU功能，
全屏提取退票单时，修改信息后在下面选S（SAVE）来存储。
data.requestSchema:
[{"name":"TES_AirTicketModifyRefundRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空电子客票修改退票单请求信息","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Point Of Sale","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"请求者信息","children":[{"name":"@PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Office号","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"TicketRefundDetailInfo","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"Option","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"PrintDeviceNo","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"打票机号","children":[]},{"name":"CmdNo","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"票号或退票单号","children":[]},{"name":"TicketType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"客票类型：国际/国内航班(I为国际航班，D为国内航班)","children":[]},{"name":"RefundType","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"退票类型：
N--Normal，普通退票
 F--Face to face，面对面信用卡退票","children":[]}]},{"name":"TRFDResult","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"RefundForm","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"RefundFormInfo","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"Check","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"AirlineCode","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"航空公司三位客票代号：例如：999","children":[]},{"name":"PassengerName","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"旅客姓名","children":[]},{"name":"EnglishName","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"英文旅客姓名信息","children":[{"name":"FirstName","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"姓","children":[]},{"name":"LastName","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"名","children":[]}]},{"name":"ChineseName","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"中文旅客姓名信息","children":[{"name":"FirstName","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"姓","children":[]},{"name":"LastName","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"名","children":[]}]},{"name":"TktNoStart","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"票号范围：开始票号，10位","children":[]},{"name":"TktNoEnd","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"票号范围：终止票号，后7位数","children":[]},{"name":"ConjunctionNo","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"连续票号数量","children":[]},{"name":"Refund","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"Y或N","children":[]},{"name":"Coupons","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"Coupon","type":"array","quantity":"1..4","default":"","description":"票证信息：最多4个","children":[{"name":"@CouponNo","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"票证航段编号（最多4个)","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"Commission","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"代理费信息","children":[{"name":"CommissionAmount","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"代理费","children":[]},{"name":"CommissionRate","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"代理费率","children":[]},{"name":"CommissionMode","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"退票代理费模式：填写0 或 1 .默认0","children":[]}]},{"name":"PaymentInfo","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"付款信息","children":[{"name":"PaymentForm","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"支付类型：(FOP)
   * 混合支付时，退款方式支持如下四种:CA-CASH CK-CHECK CQ-CHEQUE CC-CREDITCARD
    * 非混合支付时，支持如下支付方式:CASH-现金 CHECK-支票 CHEQUE--支票，
     * 主机不支持此类型 CC--信用卡 TC-信用卡，政府采购票必须填TC，GR SGR EF
     * 注:面对面信用卡退票，必须填CC/TC","children":[]},{"name":"CreditCard","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"信用卡号","children":[]},{"name":"CurrencyCode","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"货币类型：例如：CNY","children":[]},{"name":"CurrencyPrecision","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"货币精度","children":[]},{"name":"CreditVendorCode","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"信用卡供应商授权的源代码","children":[]},{"name":"BankSequenceNumber","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"银行流水号","children":[]},{"name":"Amount","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"退款金额","children":[]},{"name":"@MultiPaymentsInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"混合支付标识：true:混合支付（MFOP） false:非混合支付","children":[]}]},{"name":"RMKS","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"RMK","type":"string","quantity":"0..2","default":"","description":"备注信息：第一个表示备注类型，第二个表示备注内容","children":[]}]},{"name":"RefundFeeInfo","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"退款信息","children":[{"name":"GrossRefund","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"毛退款额","children":[]},{"name":"NetRefund","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"净退款额","children":[]},{"name":"OtherDeduction","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"扣款","children":[]},{"name":"AirlineRefund","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"航司退票金额，AR税","children":[]},{"name":"TAXS","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"TAX","type":"array","quantity":"0..27","default":"","description":"税款信息：最多27项","children":[{"name":"XFTAX","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"@XFCode","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"XF税城市三字码","children":[]},{"name":"@XFAmount","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"XF税金额","children":[]}]},{"name":"@TaxCode","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"税代码","children":[]},{"name":"@TaxAmount","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"税款金额","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"@AutoRefundType","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"自动退票标识","children":[]},{"name":"@InvoluntaryServiceInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"非自愿标识：false-自愿，true-非自愿","children":[]}]}]}]}]},{"name":"@TicketType","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"五类票客票类型","children":[]}]}]
data.responseSchema: [{"name":"TES_AirTicketModifyRefundRS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空电子客票修改退票单响应信息","children":[{"name":"Warnings","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告信息集合","children":[{"name":"Warning","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告代码","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告详细 信息","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortTextZH","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告描述信息(中文)","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"Errors","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"？错误信息：？","children":[{"name":"Error","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误代码","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误详细 信息","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortTextZH","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息（中文）","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"RefundFormNumber","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"退票单号：9位","children":[]}]}]

qaApiDemos.request:
<TES_AirTicketModifyRefundRQ>
    <POS>
        <Source PseudoCityCode="BJS187" />
    </POS>
    <TicketRefundDetailInfo>
        <Option>M</Option>
        <PrintDeviceNo>60</PrintDeviceNo>
        <CmdNo>594834125</CmdNo>
        <TicketType>D</TicketType>
    </TicketRefundDetailInfo>
    <TRFDResult>
        <RefundForm>
            <RefundFormInfo>
                <Commission>
                    <CommissionAmount>45.0</CommissionAmount>
                    <CommissionRate>0.0</CommissionRate>
                </Commission>
                <PaymentInfo>
                    <PaymentForm>TC</PaymentForm>
                    <CreditCard>TP192000088949282</CreditCard>
                    <CurrencyCode>CNY</CurrencyCode>
                </PaymentInfo>
                <RMKS>
                    <RMK>IC</RMK>
                    <RMK>WAZDTFAB</RMK>
                </RMKS>
                <RefundFeeInfo>
                    <GrossRefund>1490.0</GrossRefund>
                    <NetRefund>1490.0</NetRefund>
                    <OtherDeduction>0.0</OtherDeduction>
                    <TAXS>
                        <TAX TaxCode="CN" TaxAmount="50.0"/>
                        <TAX TaxCode="YQ" TaxAmount="0.0"/>
                        <TAX>
                            <XFTAX XFCode="SFO" XFAmount="100.0"/>
                        </TAX>
                    </TAXS>
                </RefundFeeInfo>
            </RefundFormInfo>
        </RefundForm>
    </TRFDResult>
</TES_AirTicketModifyRefundRQ>

qaApiDemos.demoDesc: AL修改退票单-完整节点版本
qaApiDemos.request:
<TES_AirTicketModifyRefundRQ TicketType="AL">
    <POS>
        <Source PseudoCityCode="BJS521"/>
    </POS>
    <TicketRefundDetailInfo>
        <Option>M</Option>
        <PrintDeviceNo>4</PrintDeviceNo>
        <CmdNo>781-791004146</CmdNo>
        <TicketType>D</TicketType>
        <RefundType>N</RefundType>
    </TicketRefundDetailInfo>
    <TRFDResult>
        <RefundForm>
            <RefundFormInfo>
                <AirlineCode>781</AirlineCode>
                <PassengerName>TEST/ADT</PassengerName>
                <EnglishName>
                    <FirstName>ADT</FirstName>
                    <LastName>TEST</LastName>
                </EnglishName>
                <ChineseName>
                    <FirstName>测</FirstName>
                    <LastName>试</LastName>
                </ChineseName>
                <Refund>N</Refund>
                <TktNoStart>2414097668</TktNoStart>
                <TktNoEnd></TktNoEnd>
                <ConjunctionNo>1</ConjunctionNo>
                <Coupons>
                    <Coupon CouponNo="1000"/>
                    <Coupon CouponNo="0000"/>
                </Coupons>
                <Commission>
                    <CommissionAmount>6.0</CommissionAmount>
                    <CommissionRate>0.0</CommissionRate>
                    <CommissionMode>TEST</CommissionMode>
                </Commission>
                <PaymentInfo MultiPaymentsInd="false">
                    <PaymentForm>TC</PaymentForm>
                    <CreditCard>TP192000088949282</CreditCard>
                    <CurrencyCode>CNY</CurrencyCode>
                    <CurrencyPrecision>0</CurrencyPrecision>
                    <CreditVendorCode>TEST</CreditVendorCode>
                    <BankSequenceNumber>TEST</BankSequenceNumber>
                    <Amount>1</Amount>
                </PaymentInfo>
                <RMKS>
                    <RMK>IC</RMK>
                    <RMK>ETS</RMK>
                </RMKS>
                <RefundFeeInfo AutoRefundType="TEST" InvoluntaryServiceInd="true">
                    <GrossRefund>1490.0</GrossRefund>
                    <NetRefund>1490.0</NetRefund>
                    <OtherDeduction>0.0</OtherDeduction>
                    <AirlineRefund>0.0</AirlineRefund>
                    <TAXS>
                        <TAX TaxCode="CN" TaxAmount="50.0"/>
                    </TAXS>
                </RefundFeeInfo>
            </RefundFormInfo>
        </RefundForm>
    </TRFDResult>
</TES_AirTicketModifyRefundRQ>

</TES_AirTicketModifyRefundRQ>
